items.title: Infosys board approves Rs 18,000-crore share buyback proposal
items.description: The board of the Bengaluru-headquartered company held a meeting on Thursday to consider the proposal

items.title: After US pullout, phone maker HMD banks on India with mass-market 5G phones and security-focused business
items.description: HMD has partnered with British cybersecurity firm SafeToNet to integrate AI-driven child protection features into the Fuse device, which is currently available in the UK.

items.title: Indian FMCG majors pause or scale down operations in Nepal after deadly unrest
items.description: The ongoing unrest has crippled supply chains of consumer products manufacturers, however, any further impact has been brushed off by the businesses that have exposure.

items.title: We don't need to overpay for deposits anymore: Unity SFB's Jaspal Bindra
items.description: We have no immediate need to raise funds. We have few years before the IPO mandate kicks in; there is ample time to plan, Bindra said

items.title: Escorts Kubota: Tractors power ahead, CE segment slows the speed
items.description: Policy support and farm sentiment lift growth outlook, but market share pressure persists

items.title: Can Control Print be a stock worth printing for the long term?
items.description: The company has a strong balance sheet and a unique core business that cannot be ignored

items.title: Shaily Engineering: Improved traction in the healthcare segment
items.description: The company has delivered a close to 4x return to investors since being recommended in MC Pro’s Discovery series
